website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for leak-free storage,though not for consumers who prefer traditional snap-on lids.
pros: Features a unique locking design that creates a totally leak-proof closure
Convenient to take along to work and school
cons: Some testers noted that the four-sided locking mechanisms are a bit difficult to close

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw this set of popit little big box plastic containert I was so upset back in December 23, 2013 so small I thought and sent them back. The seller contacted me and sent me the set as a gift, it took me awhile before using. But these are the BEST CONTAINERS. THEY DON'T LEAK /HOLD FOOD ODERS FOR A LONG TIME. I WOULDN'T have known this if the seller hadn't gave me the popit set as a gift. I'm a tiny person who has a very big heart, so I'm telling the seller I apologizing to the seller PLEASE ACCEPT MY APOLOGIES.
customer_reviews.author: G. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: Really bummed about this purchase. There were so many positive reviews, but my experience with these have been pretty poor. I've only had for a couple weeks, and already some of the tabs seem to have warped so they won't snap all the way closed. We haven't put them in the microwave or the dishwasher so I don't understand what these containers are already breaking down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for storage but not microwave
customer_reviews.text: I have several different sizes. They do stack (sort of) and seal really well. However, each time I have reheated something in the microwave, the plastic became rough. I was not cooking foods with tomatoes, etc., that are tough on plastic. I am disappointed with them because my reason for purchasing them was to freeze and then reheat small portions of leftovers. You're better off going with glass (or a different brand, perhaps) if you're going to use them to reheat foods in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: JEA

customer_reviews.title: We’ve had these about 4-years now and no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: They were a little less expensive in 2014 but well worth the cost then and now. The tops fit tight and nothing has broken yet. We are inundated quickly with the sugar ant squads whenever something is open enough to get their attention but they have yet to enter one of these containers. No complaints will warrant 5-stars every time.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Held up amazingly well, still closes with a perfect seal!
customer_reviews.text: Buy these!!! These things are great and have held up so great through the years, i use them constantly for storing leftovers and reheating them. For them being the "snap" close they are a great price and have never once given me a problem (all 8 of them) ... I dish-wash them with all my other dirty dishes and they have held up so well. The one gripe i do have (which i have with most food storage containers) is sometimes they get stained and will not come out, these are not 100% flawless but still have a nice crystal clear look to them!
customer_reviews.author: 828Jeddy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carrying all types of food!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am a college student and wanted to save money by packing my own food and bring them to campus for lunch. These containers are exactly what I needed! They come in multiple sizes so you can store anything from fruit, to rice, to sauces! They are completely leak-proof as I have stored soups and haven't experienced any leakage. These are well-made, sturdy containers and I highly recommend them to anyone that is looking for convenient, reliable containers to store their food. I am looking to purchase a second set because I love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Urban Aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient, dishwasher safe, tricky to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact these are without sacrificing size. They are easy to open, so when I need to get to the smallest container and open all of the larger ones, I can do it relatively quickly. Only downside is cleaning the top with the rubber lining. Yes it’s necessary to make it leak proof but it’s hard to get out any stuck sauce or liquids that stain. I have put them in the dish washer and they hold up well but again, it’s hard to get remnants out of the top. All in all I would suggest- very versatile
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline W

customer_reviews.title: 3 Year old set review:  Love this set.
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money, won't leak, I dropped one full of liquid, no mess on the floor!!! I have had a set since 2014, seal is still good. Freeze a lot of food, this set is fantastic. I am ordering another set, as I have lost, (Given away with left overs, and piece was not returned.) pieces. I have an amazing experience with celery, I have wasted so much, because it always turns brown. The picture attached is celery that has been in this container for a MONTH!!!!! I have not lost a piece.
customer_reviews.author: Geneva

customer_reviews.title: Great tupperwear.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Geocaching containers and they work great keeping out the dust/sand/water in the desert while waiting to be found by a fellow Geocacher. They seal tight and are see through. which was a perfect solution for our needs. I expect these would work well for food storage as well. They are stackable when not being used, and are stackable when in use. Great tupperwear.
customer_reviews.author: VannahRucker

customer_reviews.title: Seals well but possibly weak hinges
customer_reviews.text: I took them on one camping trip and now one of the hinges won't stay closed. Hinges seem weak in general. But I did really like that none of them leaked while submerged in my cooler water, since that's what I bought them for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best containers I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best snap top food containers I have ever purchased. They snap easily and don't leak. I generally take my lunch to work and have had containers in the past that were hard (sometimes impossible) to snap closed and sometimes leaked. These containers have performed flawlessly over several months and I will purchase again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Steelman86

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I went through a LOT of storage containers and I was always loosing lids and the lids would warp in the dishwasher so they wouldn't stay on right. The fact that these have the locking tabs on all 4 sides means you get a good tight seal. I have washed them in the dishwasher several times and no warping yet. I'll likely get another set at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Franzen

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I ordered them several years ago and they have held up great (other than the ones that my dog got a hold of and destroyed). I ordered another brand that was a little cheaper this year to replenish the ones my dog had eaten, and don’t like them nearly as much as these. Wish I had purchased these again!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great design and packaging, every size you need in one small box
customer_reviews.text: These storage containers fit inside each other, making storing (while not in use) easy and manageable. Gone is the drawer full of containers. These fit into the two biggest squares. I initially thought I received the wrong set until I removed them from the outer box. They fit into such a small package yet provide eight different, useful sizes. These are great for storing leftovers or packing lunch and snacks. They even come with a note from the company with instructions on care (easy) and how to contact the company. I think this company has the potential to capture a good share of the plastic storage container market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like them except...
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted these to be great however they are not leak proof but they do a decent job. You CANNOT put them in the microwave and I’ve been to scared to put them in the dishwasher. I d love how stackable they are and they don’t take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Forrest

customer_reviews.title: I guess my biggest issue with this product is that ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess my biggest issue with this product is that it was much smaller than I had hoped it would be. Additionally, although this is not a criticism of the product itself, I did not realize that it comes in two different sized sets. Keep that in mind when you are purchasing it because it is something that I did not notice and could be an issue if you want everything to be the same size.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Finally.....storage containers that are easy to close and are leak proof. They clean easily in the dishwasher and are designed to not have water left on them after the dry cycle. I am very impressed with these containers. My husband said to throw our old containers away.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: These containers are great. They create a good seal and they're durable
customer_reviews.text: These containers are great. They create a good seal and they're durable. The only issue I have (which is really just personal preference) is that like sizes don't stack. I got two sets and I organize with like sizes together. These only nest - with the smaller containers inside the bigger ones. It wasn't a big enough deal to return them, but had I known about it I probably would have gone with something else.
customer_reviews.author: B-rae

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, these are over-priced for the quality and quantity received. Keep in mind that you receive 8 containers, which have lids, this is how they calculate '16 pieces.' Sizes are small and seem a bit light-weight as far as I am concerned. Won't order again!
customer_reviews.author: BMcCabe

customer_reviews.title: Airtight and they don't leak
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were going to be bigger, I wonder if I'm the only woman who can't seem to picture how large something is going to be. But, for their size their perfect. I like the way I can store them nestled with the lids on the side. I like that they don't shrink in the dishwasher and that they also don't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H. Watts

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift after trying the set myself. The lids really DO lock and they all nest saving space. Sometimes, if one is in a hurry to get the right size OUT or to stack and put them away, it can get on your nerves a bit having to take some out and restack them or to get the size you want. Otherwise they are really, really great containers and CAN be put in the dishwasher ON THE TOP SHELF. Which is pretty much a standard 'warning' on any plastic storage containers. Get them. You WILL love them. Amazon Prime delivery and I would and HAVE use the seller again. ;o)
customer_reviews.author: Kazcon

customer_reviews.title: Love the fact that they nest
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of Pop It’s—I love them. I like the nesting component and the fact that the individual containers are sturdy. My first set is showing some wear and tear due to microwaving leftovers or freezing leftovers, but they are still my favorite storage containers. If for some reason, I had to start all over with everything, these containers would be high in my list!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia R. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! I trust Popit 100%
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research on different brands of tupperwears I finally found one that I can really trust!! I am a college student and I am always involved in extracurricular activities, which keep me busy the whole day. So I carry food with me on a Popit all the time and IS GREAT! Other containers have give me a hard time because they spill easy or they don't close as well and this is awful because I carry them INSIDE MY BACKPACK!! Popit is a great product, after using it for a couple of weeks I trust it 100% now and the best part is that I can microwave my food in the same container.
customer_reviews.author: Javier D.

customer_reviews.title: Two large filled with six unusable.
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid better attention to the size of these containers..... The 2 largest ones are ok. The other six are small. The smallest one is like 3"x3". I'm sure it's ok if you are sending your child to school with some cereal or a couple grapes to snack on but, that's about it. I'll be returning them. I need 8 "useable" containers. They are good quality......just tiny
customer_reviews.author: Porscheguy

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof/Leak proof!
customer_reviews.text: Both sets are square. One is just more shallow than the other. The picture makes one look rectangular (my own fault for not reading the dimensions). They have worked well for ua the past few months. I went camping this past weekend and loaded up our food into these containers and buried them in ice. Not thinking that ice becomes water - these didn't leak at all and I had them buryied in ice water for days!! I'll be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: mindyjoyrn

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best containers I have ever used. I love how easily they nest! They wash like normal decently priced plastic. If you leave something in it, it might stain, but that is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Its so small in appearance
customer_reviews.text: Its funny it looked so small i thought it was a mistake ....talk about amazing space saver theres eight containers but it looks like 2 tiny ones square is the best shape to save space
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S.

customer_reviews.title: but I am so glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to purchase these because of the mixed reviews, but I am so glad that I did! The containers are higher quality than I expected and feel strong and sturdy. They're also watertight! They've also got a nice variety of size between the containers. I would most definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space Savers
customer_reviews.text: We live on our sailboat, therefore we have limited space to store items and in the freezer compartment. I love these containers because they nestle together and I can shelve one set on top of the other. The best characteristic is they do not leak!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Careful in the microwave!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the lids were microwavable. But the only real issue is that I put ravioli in them and microwaved it and the ravioli burned/melted the side so not 100% microwaveable there is a temperature limit.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not 16 containers!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is useful and exactly what I thought I was purchasing. However I was under the impression it would be a 16 piece set. At no point on amazon did it say on here that the 16 piece set was 8 containers and 8 lids totaling 16 pieces of Tupperware. I like the product, but should be explained and labeled on amazon better for less confusion and a lower price that it is right now. For 8 pieces of Tupperware for $21 I am a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: connor hayden

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product beyond 1 problem
customer_reviews.text: Would rate this 4 stars or up, but the old to 1 of the bigger containers was completely missing 1 latch. Looked around to make sure I didn't break it, as far as I can tell it came that way. I would return, but before noticing I had filled and frozen the others.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO happy i bought this!
customer_reviews.text: unfamiliar w/brand and its features but it's perfect....and imho even more sturdy than rubbermaid and handles in microwave BEAUTIFULLY. very happy.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonHobbyist

customer_reviews.title: Compact, leakproof, saves space, perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best set of containers I've ever used. Buy it, you won't be disappointed. It comes in this cute box, varied sizes, leak proof, perfect design, saves space. Outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Two broken lids of the set
customer_reviews.text: Container seem to be working well during these first days. However, of the two sets that arrived, two of the lids came broken so I cannot use the biggest containers.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The largest is not good for a family of 4
customer_reviews.text: Not as large as I's want. Pay attention to the size. The largest is not good for a family of 4. Don't expect to put to much in it. Still good for the little items.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl  Peavy

customer_reviews.title: Some awkward sizes but love these, they definitely don't open and are totally ...
customer_reviews.text: Some awkward sizes but love these, they definitely don't open and are totally leak proof, so its great, I even throw my food in my backpack and take it to work and don't worry about it spilling in my backpack or anything
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect containers
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers. My husband is a corrections officer and everything has to be in an all clear container. He is able to hold all different kinds of foods with no concerns of it leaking. The only downfall is we have a monster that comes in the middle of the night and eats the lids. We can't ever seem to find the lids anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: selenarp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I am in the process of substituting all of my plastic containers for BPA free equivalents. Popit Little Big Box was a perfect choice. The plastic is sturdy, the lids fasten in a secure and air tight fashion, the sizes are perfect for storing leftovers of varying volume and for carrying foodstuffs. I especially appreciate the fact that the containers are not only stackable, but fit into one another minimizing storage space. At this price, it's hard to imagine a better bargain. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Antonio Arce Arenales

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: The containers are the BEST! Imitation ones don’t come close!! Sturdy and air tight!! Great variety of sizes! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great set of storage containers
customer_reviews.text: These are the best storage containers i have ever owned. I love that they do not leak when you seal them & they are easy to close & keep together for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Athena M. Vega

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again :))))
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and the thickness of these. The lid clips on and off easily. It comes with two sets of lunch boxes in which one is higher and one is lower in depth. All of them fit perfectly in my lunchbox :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Woo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storage
customer_reviews.text: I love these storage boxes and am so glad I found them online! They are attractive and very functional. The sizes are perfect. Since I haven't stored anything for more than a day so far, i can't speak to how fresh they keep food, but I am confident that they will help with freshness because the lids close very tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Dreyna

customer_reviews.title: Cannot microwave lids! If that annoys you, which it does me, do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Not cool that it says you cannot microwave the lids. Not fully microwave safe. Always a darn catch with everything.
customer_reviews.author: deathnesia

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have decided to purchase all food storage with this type of lid. This lid seems more sturdy, and stays put so much better than the traditional kind. This is a good "starter" set.
customer_reviews.author: Oklahomaborn

customer_reviews.title: love these, they all fit together (with the lids ...
customer_reviews.text: love these, they all fit together (with the lids on) so they only take up the space for 2 containers (with the lids on, I hate having to search for the lid that fits the container). seem to seal airtight. might order another set.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these yesterday. I had originally thought the tops were attached somehow, but when I saw that each side "pops" down, I decided I liked them just as well, maybe a little more as they're really easy to clean. The seal seems to be super tight to keep spills in the fridge to a minimum. We'll see how long they last, but I love how they fit together and save room in my ridiculously messy "Tupperware cabinet". We may change that name to the"popit" cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaRN

customer_reviews.title: Love these containers!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased in the aftermath of a pantry moth infestation that left no dry good unscathed. They have been an absolute lifesaver. Nuts stay fresh. Rice remains moth and pest free. They're also excellent for takeaway lunches. Even soups do not leak! They are truly airtight, watertight, and the locking lids give even more peace of mind. They are so awesome!
customer_reviews.author: New England Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I love, love, love, love, LOVE these food containers!
customer_reviews.text: These containers are simply amazing. The lids fit snugly and the latches fit over very smoothly. I can't tell you how much I prefer these locking lids over traditional fit lids. It's really, really easy to open and close and they fit so snug you don't need to worry about them leaking. If you or a loved one have trouble with opening and closing traditional tight fit lids, I cannot recommend these highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Leialoha

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these containers for a while and I like them, I live alone and usually have something leftover and these seal very well to keep stuff fresh. I have read reviews where some buyers said the locks or hinges are a weak point.. Mine seem to be well made and I guess time will tell. I think that for the reasonable price of these that they are a good deal. I am glad I chose these and I would probably buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jake J.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Leak Proof!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because my husband complained about his foods leaking and refused to pack anything with fluids for work. I decided to give these a try and they were well worth the purchase. I've packed soups and NO leaks! I will definitely order more.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Noel

customer_reviews.title: Not great for closing
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but not very ease to close. Prefer a different type of closing mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: gaby

customer_reviews.title: Great foodkeepers
customer_reviews.text: these are great food savers.I've ordered these before and I rdered them again when my son inlaw left it all at work and never brought it home.KIll kill kill!MEN!
customer_reviews.author: denise m veratti

customer_reviews.title: Not air tight! Food containers have to be air tight, that's  a basic!
customer_reviews.text: Look good but these are not air tight! I put chopped onion & foods in 2 of the boxes and my freeze was full of onion & food smells on the next morning and its not like I've not closed the leads properly because these are 4 click lead close so u can't miss it!
customer_reviews.author: knight_darkness

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing is that they EASILY stack inside one another. I think I am going to buy another set actially
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Wiegand

customer_reviews.title: Daughter in college and we need all the containers we can have will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love love love bought several packs because I have Daughter in college and we need all the containers we can have will buy again
customer_reviews.author: MEMY5953

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product: they arrived promptly and in perfect condition (and I got an email form the seller company the next day of my purchase to introduce their product and leave consumer service info in case needed). They have this super nice smooth, slim yet sturdy design and it's great that you can stack them together to save space. I've used them for a week now and they have resisted our tough use! I think I am going to replace all my old different size-color-brand plastic boxes with these cuties!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Quiroga

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE A GREAT VALUE AND THE BEST CONTAINERS I HAVE FOUND
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT TWO SETS OF THESE. THEY ARE A GREAT VALUE AND THE BEST CONTAINERS I HAVE FOUND. I HAVE HAD THEM FOR OVER A MONTH AND THEY SURVIVE THE DISH WASHER GREAT. THEY DON'T LEAK. THE SELLER CONTACTED ME AND SAID THAT IF THERE EVER WAS A PROBLEM TO CONTACT HER. WHERE DO YOU GET GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE LIKE THAT? ONLY HERE.
customer_reviews.author: EILEEN from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to open or snap shut, thick and durable vs. some of the thin plastic ones I bought in the store (different brands). Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: After a couple of months, They are like brand new
customer_reviews.text: So I decided to wait until I wrote my review a few months after purchasing the item. Just so I can accurately judge the durability of the containers. I purchased them originally as just a way of taking my food to work, but they ended up replacing all my plastic containers. All of which are sitting on the top shelf of my kitchen cabinet. I use them everyday, especially the largest and smallest sizes. Just put my sandwich or salad in them and lock the tops which so far have not become worn or loose. I also microwave in them, and wash them in the dishwasher. These are definitely a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: What Can I Say
customer_reviews.text: These containers are just what I wanted and needed. They are just as described on the website. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: lobo

customer_reviews.title: storage containers
customer_reviews.text: not good in microwave. everything else is true.Arrived in timely manner. just as expected and described. Great price .
customer_reviews.author: CindySue

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I've been using them for about a month ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I've been using them for about a month and they haven't stained, even with tomato sauce. I love that you can fill these containers all the way to the top, and the link sits on the top edge instead of pushing down the food inside. I haven't yet had any issues with spills. Great variety of sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Kowal

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: what they don't say is that they FIT INSIDE EACHOTHER... the entire set fits (with lids) inside the biggest container. I TOTALLY LOVE IT ... what a space saver ... well i'm back for more my daughter stole mine when she moved out... and since everyone uses them to carry lunch in their backpack with it i need more.
customer_reviews.author: laq

customer_reviews.title: Good Containers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and had them shipped to my parents. They were very pleased with the quality over all and said they sealed well and were easy to open and close. They liked that they stacked inside each other for easy storage. The only problem was that one of the four snap closures were broken on the large container when it arrived. The container still seals so they aren't concerned about it.
customer_reviews.author: Padme

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: My "container drawer" was overflowing with Cool Whip bowls, lunchmeat containers & more Tupperware lids than bowls. These containers are wonderful. The only ones I haven't used yet are the smallest ones. Worth the money & I plan to order another set!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: These are great!! I've been having them a few months ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! I've been having them a few months and they are perfect for storing food! The locks are tight so the food stays fresh and does not spill out if turned over. It can be washed in the dishwasher which is fantastic! Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Harmony A.Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Turning the Common Place Into Somethng Quite Marvelous
customer_reviews.text: Popit containers are easily one of the best food-keeping utensils on the market. The different sizes are marvelous; and I very much like the fact that the containers can be very firmly closed. Thus, barring some major form of damage, anything placed in Popit container is quite protected. Indeed, a slight accidental fall of a Popit container that has been completely closed is not at all likely to result in the contents the container spilling out. Nor will the container itself suffer damage. Taken together, the two points just made indicate just how wonderful Popit containers are.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Thomas

customer_reviews.title: etc) but I like these the best because of the multiple sizes and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many other food storage systems (rubbermaid, etc) but I like these the best because of the multiple sizes and no leaks when I put my lunch in my backpack. I wish they weren't plastic, but I don't heat up my foods in them so it's not much of an issue. Great deal for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases! I bought these for when I go to work and needed different size containers... they are AMAZING!!! I love the many different sizes. I have had them for about 4 months now and have not had one single leak. I have used the smallest ones for condiments on-the-go and the largest ones fit a whole sandwich (and then some). I actually use the largest one for dog bones for my pup and it keeps them sealed and fresh! Definitely a great purchase and would 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Love them except it's difficult to store the lids without putting them on the tubs which takes up alot of room. Love the lids!
customer_reviews.author: P.S.

customer_reviews.title: Just started to use but so I like them. I had other containers that I couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started to use but so I like them. I had other containers that I couldn't close the lids due to lack of hand strength but theses I am able to open and close easily. They also nest very well into 2 stackable containers. I will probably also purchase the glass set for refrigerator storage of sauces that stain.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Riddle

customer_reviews.title: These are great containers and they nest perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These are great containers and they nest perfectly! I've only used them for a few weeks, but they show no signs of wear and the tops seal without spillage. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: PB&J

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very small, impractical containers aside from the largest size. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: harper jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome storage containers!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe it's taken me so long to purchase these type of storage containers!!! I love how they're so secure with the locking lids - great for things that have the potential to leak like soup, etc. They're very heavy duty plastic, and light weight. Just love them! Would definitely recommend and will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great storage containers. They really do not leak! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Best plastic storage containers ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers. I have certainly enjoyed using them as they are convenient and great for storing a variety of food items. I decided to start using storage containers I could wash and reuse and cut back on using so many zip lock bags. They fit great in the cupboard and are easy to wash and I think they're perfect. I even thought of them as a gift item. I have something similar in glass, but these are far better.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Bevan

customer_reviews.title: It definitely saves space and locks excellent, one of the best tupperwares I've ever had ...
customer_reviews.text: If I need the little one I have to open all the big ones first and vice versa to put it back. It definitely saves space and locks excellent, one of the best tupperwares I've ever had if going by quality, but for someone the uses these almost daily its s bit of a pain. I don't regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stel

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof, clean up easy
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic!! I ordered from Amazon as they seemed to have the price best price around. I was not disappointed- nothing leaks, they varying sizes are just what I needed to bring my lunch to work everyday. There are sizes for sandwiches, salads, etc. These are easy to clean after use.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: These are great. The different sizes are fantastic for my left ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The different sizes are fantastic for my left overs and packed lunches. They're easy to open and store, and I love that they easily stack inside one another to keep my cabinets clutter-free.
customer_reviews.author: dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Great set - truly leakproof
customer_reviews.text: Love these - they next in each other perfectly, so they don't take up too much space. They really are leak proof, so my husband can throw his lunch in his motorcycle saddlebags and not worry about the vibrations causing his lunch to leak. They also keep food fresh longer - I forgot about a brownie for over a week and it wasn't moldy, dry or hard.
customer_reviews.author: C. Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Secure lids
customer_reviews.text: These lids are super secure! Come in decent sizes, though the very tiny ones are a bit ridiculous. I've had this product for years and havent had any issues. Good in the dishwasher, no cracks or anything else at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Great stackable's
customer_reviews.text: Love these... There's a great variety in sizes and they stack inside each other for a great space saving design. Especially those with small kitchens . I will definitely buy more, and you should too!
customer_reviews.author: Everydayme

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I expected them to be. I will be buying another set soon
customer_reviews.author: Aeriel Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I love these things!
customer_reviews.text: These are WONDERFUL storage containers. I use these every day to take my lunch to work. Having 8 different sizes is perfect for packing leftovers or a little side of something. They wash well in the dishwasher and have not stained yet. I would order more of these if I ever needed to replace my current ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M Randle

customer_reviews.title: Move over Tupperware
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. The sizes are perfect for storing leftovers, or meal planning. I love that they actually seal and don't spill, plus they are dishwasher safe. They also fit inside of each other so that makes storage so effortless.
customer_reviews.author: kensi

customer_reviews.title: Eat better, save $
customer_reviews.text: These boxes are what you need to run an adult refrigerator. You have the right idea using that prepackaged stuff from Trader Joe's, but now you can make you own. Better, cheaper, and it is fun. These boxes are right-sized, will last decades.and they have style.
customer_reviews.author: CIB

customer_reviews.title: One came broken. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about these since they were leakproof, so I could get rid of all of my standard tupperware that weren't. Finally, no more messes in the bottom of my lunchbox. But when I opened the box, one of the larger containers had a flap that was broken. The rest seem ok (hence 2 stars instead of 1), but I'm not sure how long they'll last. It was only $20 so, I'm not super upset. An 8 set from any other brand are more expensive so you get your money's worth with these.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: I really like the fact that you get two lids at each ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that you get two lids at each size, the locking design makes me feel fine throwing these into bags or whatever. The smallest sizes are honestly useless, maybe you have a little bit of ketchup to put away? Half a grape?
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Food Storage Containers!
customer_reviews.text: I have thrown all my other food storage containers away and replaced them with these. I just ordered a 2nd set!
customer_reviews.author: Darcey

customer_reviews.title: Love my popits.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Popit set. The different sizes are perfect, freezer safe, the lock's are easy to open and close, I love they are dishwasher and microwave safe. And being BPA free is very important. You can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like them
customer_reviews.text: These are great. A couple of them are a lot smaller than I expected, but I still find uses for them. Not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I'm guy who works full time and is tired of eating out every single day. I decided to buy these along with a whole bunch of stuff and couldn't be happier! My order arrived 2 days after being shipped and in perfect condition. The containers feel sturdy and make me confident that they will not leak or break while in my back pack. Just buy these. You'll love them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Best in food storage, no BPA to harm your DNA.
customer_reviews.text: These containers are freezer, microwave, and dishwasher safe. They save money, make food storage more convenient, and are cheap for 8 containers. The rubber seal under the lid is airtight once the latches are fastened, and they have an easy action. The only thing that would make these better, in my opinion, is vents. They stack perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Perry

customer_reviews.title: Beyond happy with Popit's
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I mean totally awesome and customer service & delivery were spot on. If you need stoa the containers this is the only ones you should buy.
customer_reviews.author: mommafee

customer_reviews.title: Popits Rock!
customer_reviews.text: Simply love my new Popits! Easy to store empty or full. Clear for viewing food even w/o a label. Compact & perfect size choices for your personal needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Containers!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed plastic, BPA free AND microwave safe containers that my 4.5 year old could manage at school AND these fit the bill perfectly! The containers are very easy to open/close and the various sizes are perfect for preschool/elementary portions. I want to order more but they're NOT available. I hope they do come back - great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and it was used for Christmas leftovers. Seemed to work really well. Loved the sizes and they all fit inside each other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Thick plastic and no leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tupperware! Nice and thick plastic that snaps into place to prevent spillage (even with liquids it works). No more lunches spilling out in my bag. I've run them through the dishwasher multiple times as well and they still work great. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Love these Tupperware's
customer_reviews.text: Love these Tupperware's! They keep my food fresh and they DON'T LEAK! Highly recommend for someone in need of good, inexpensive and great sized Tupperware!
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn McNulty

product_meta.title: Plastic Food Storage Containers 16 Piece Set, Leak Proof, Meal Prep, Little Big Box by Popit!
product_meta.description: Popit! is a new brand of high quality airtight plastic containers designed to fit your needs. It is perfect for storing food and liquids, as well as other stuff around the house, office or workshop. It won't spill your liquids ever, and the freshness in those delicate ingredients such as fruits or vegetables will be greatly increased when stored inside Popit!, meaning you'll save money and won't throw away as much leftovers as you used to. Are you into geocaching? Use these to store your caches and guard them from the elements like rain or dust. Popit! containers are perfectly safe for storing food since they are 100% BPA free. This is a leader in terms of quality, durability and ease of use. They have clear brilliance due to its BPA Free material. It will always be you best ally in the kitchen to help as meal prep container or to store leftovers in its compartment. Stop treating every meal as disposable and use this freshware to keep it for longer, just heat it up since it's microwavable and reusable so your meals are ready to be served. You can also take them on the go and be sure they won't spill when you get takeout. Its different sized help with portion control so can choose which compartments are better for your needs. Take salad, soups, dressing, chicken, meatballs or whichever food. and forget about disposable items and help the environment with meal prepping. Popit! Also offers different sets of different sizes for lunch and almost any occasion to fit your everyday needs, these containers are stackable into 2 stacks. Our Stackit set also has rectangle shaped containers so you can always store your leftover food and use it as snack later on.
feature_bullets: Our patented lid and hollow silicone seal system prevents any leakage so you can carry liquids with absolute confidence anywhere you want to go. Take soup, gravy, dressing, or whatever you want, wherever you go.

Save money on food because it lasts longer than on generic containers. Our containers basically pay for themselves on the food you save. They are also robust, so you won’t have to worry about them being damaged easily, with thick walls and lid, they will last forever.

Made out of Polypropylene that is free of any chemicals, BPA, and any other toxins. You can be sure our containers are safe for storing food. Our containers are freezer safe, microwave safe (up to 250F), dishwasher safe and stackable to save space. Remember to remove the lid when using the microwave so that pressure buildup does not damage your items.
Perfect for Lunchbox and Meal Prepping
8 SIZES: This variety pack includes 3 oz (0.46 cups), 6 oz (0.84 cups), 9 oz (1.14 cups), 15 oz (1.9 cups), 19 oz (2.4 cups), 28 oz (3.5 cups), 37 oz (4.6 cups), and 47 oz (5.9 cups) size containers.
